I actually just (finally) signed up to piratebay to reply to comments on here about why the file sizes are so big...it's because these are .INFO and .VOB files. I DL'ed this not paying attention to the file sizes and am now encoding them (which on my laptop is going to take a really long time.)

If you have the time and patience to do so then DL this file, otherwise there IS another torrent on this site that will give you both Heavy Metal and Heavy Metal 2000 that are encoded to .avi.
